long_description: The men's Marmot Hyper Lite Jacket with GORE-TEX(R) Active(R) fabric delivers exceptional breathability on uphill slogs as well as waterproof, windproof performance at a superlight weight. Shell is 100% seam taped for waterproofness. Helmet-compatible hood has a moldable brim so you can customize the angle. Pit-zips with water-resistant zippers let you expel excess heat instantly; integrated cooling vents. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow full range of arm motion and prevent jacket from rising up when arms are raised. Pack-friendly pockets on the men's Marmot Hyper Lite Jacket feature water-resistant zippers. Asymmetrical cuffs provide extra coverage; cuffs and hem adjust to seal in warmth.
short_description: The men's Marmot Hyper Lite Jacket with GORE-TEX(R) Active(R) fabric delivers exceptional breathability on uphill slogs as well as waterproof, windproof performance at a superlight weight.
